Home → Films and DVDs → New films and DVDs for September 2015

New films and DVDs for September 2015

Sep 1, 2015 • Brandon King

Avengers: Age of Ultron

Marvel’s blockbuster team returns to save the world from defeat by Ultron.

Fast and Furious 7

Action thriller featuring the late Paul Walker in his last role. The crew intervene to dismantle a terrorist plot.

Pitch Perfect 2

Comedy sequel starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson. The Barden Bellas compete in an international acapella contest.

Spooks: The greater good

British thriller with Kit Harington. Disgraced MI5 agent and a newcomer uncover a traitor in the organisation.

John Wick

Keanu Reeves plays an ex-hitman seeking revenge in this action-packed thriller. Warning: the dog dies.

The Age of Adaline

Romance set in the early 20th-century. Adaline has a bizarre secret: she hasn’t aged for 8 years. Her secret threatens to be released when she falls for a philanthropist.
